-234.875

S = segno; E = esponente; M = mantissa

S = 1

234 -> 11101010

E = 7 + 127 = 6 + 128 -> 10000110

.874 -> 111

M = 1101010111

1 10000110 11010101110000000000000


Il secondo Ã¨: 

0 10000100 00010001000000000000000

S = 0

E = 10000100 = 128 + 4 = 127 + 5 = 5

M = 00010001 

-> 100010.001 = 34.125
